Room.Name: Marina Way/Regalia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Regalia Drive and Marina Way.
Room.LongDescription: Regalia Way runs west from here towards the Oceancrest Memorial Fountain and eventually reaches the western City Wall. Marina Way runs north to south. The Regalia Convent is located to the east of Marina Way. It is a strange religious order as the nuns and priestesses strongly believe in a monotheistic philosophy, thus are often shunned by other religious orders. The entrances to the Convent are located to the north and south of here.
